pkgmetadata.longdescription: A collection of audio level meters with GUI in LV2 plugin format. It include needle style meters (mono and stareo): IEC 60268-10 1-DIN, 1-Nordic, IIa-BBC, IIb-EBU, IEC 69268-17 VU. Stereo and mono variants of bar-graphe meters: 30 Band IEC 61260, Phase Correlation, ... and other stereo plugins.
